roleset.name: say solemnly
roleset.note: INTONE-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. Member of VNcls performance-26.7-1. (from intone.01-v)

example.name: intone-v
example.text: At another point he intones: ``Publicity is a small price to pay for secrecy.''
example.arg: Publicity is a small price to pay for secrecy

example.name: intonation-n
example.text: For pious Catholics, daily religious life also consisted of the intonation of prayers if there was a difficulty, illness, or natural calamity.
example.arg: if there was a difficulty, illness, or natural calamity.
